properties.name: grails.transaction.chainedTransactionManager.blacklistPattern
properties.description: The pattern of transaction manager bean names to deny to register.

properties.name: grails.transaction.chainedTransactionManager.whitelistPattern
properties.description: The pattern of transaction manager bean names to allow to register.

properties.name: grails.transaction.chainedTransactionManager.enabled
properties.description: Wheather to enable chained transaction management.

properties.name: hibernate.osiv.enabled
properties.description: Register OpenSessionInViewInterceptor that binds a Hibernate Session to the thread for the entire processing of the request.
